aboutpara: Hey there! I'm Ackrawin, a computer engineering student with a passion for creating beautiful and functional designs. As a UI designer, I'm constantly seeking new ways to merge my technical knowledge with my creativity to craft user experiences that are both visually stunning and highly intuitive. Take a look at some of my recent projects and see how I'm working to bridge the gap between technology and design.

experiences.bullets: Instructed wireframing tools (e.g. Figma) to improve student design proficiency., Collaborated with teacher to develop effective instructional plans for student., Reviewed and assessed student work to ensure alignment with learning objectives.

Received Unicorn Award (Given to 3 Top Performer) from 80 interns., Collected user feedback to inform design decisions and enhance product usability., Redesigned TrueID prototypes to improve usability and align with   business requirements.
